plugin.name: Themes+
settings.header: Themes+ is **{active, select, true {active} false {inactive} other {}}**
settings.inactive.themes_plus_unsupporte: The selected theme doesn't support Themes+
modal.config.title: Configuration
modal.config.iconpack.title: Iconpack
modal.config.iconpack.mode.automatic.des: Iconpack chosen by your current theme
modal.config.iconpack.custom.url.desc: The main URL where all icons are located
modal.config.iconpack.custom.suffix.desc: Appends a string after the icon name for compability with iOs based iconpacks. **Avoid** using this in new iconpacks.
modal.config.iconpack.custom.config.bigg: Makes status icons a bit bigger for compability. **Avoid** using this in new iconpacks.
alert.downloadpack.title: Download iconpack
alert.downloadpack.body: Are you sure you want to download **{iconpack}**? This will take up **{space}**.
